amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for the Mentally Ill Offender Treatment and Crime Reduction Act by $2 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funding for salaries and expenses of the Federal Prison System by $2 million and increase funding for mental health courts and adult and juvenile collaboration grants.
